page.title: 13Mr Sydney T**** of Thackley
page.content: Mr T****, like most of our informants, is now retired. He used to own a local milk-round,but has now sold it.The milk round meant that he knows many people in Thackley,from all walks of life.He has lived there for the last 30 years,and likes the village a lot. He feels that Thackley is becoming purely a{residential}and{service industry area,although the local textile mill is doing well.Most jobs there seem to go to the 30+ age group. Reflecting his own preoccupations, Mr T**** talked to us mainly about leisure. He feels that part of Thackley's attractiveness lies in its {gardens.}Most people,he says,take a real pride in their gardens, and they also go in for really big allotments. The cricket club is{"mediocre"}a big admission for a Yorkshireman,although he admits the players are keen enough.
